scenario_text.value:
Whaddaya think? My plan to play the bait went
off without a hitch, don’t you think?

I guess, but we were pretty worried about you
getting hurt...

This isn’t enough to faze me! I had faith
that Agumon and Labramon would protect me!

And besides, Floramon might be facing the
same kind of enemy attack, so...
I’ll do anything I can to find her quickly!

I got you... Still, don’t do anything risky,
okay?

Sure, that’s enough for me. If I’m being
honest...I was pretty freaked out back there.
